name: Balloons Pop
description:
It was suppose to be a wonderful party, but now the balloons are flying everywhere and could cause a fault in the power line if it touches it.

You mission is to pop the balloons by touching it to prevent them from touching the power line.

Note: Game is to be played on mobile not computers as it was not designed for computers.

Please support this game. Your support will get this game to the Google play store.
